text: Also, because of this ‘the wisdom of God’In 1 Corinthians 1:24 Paul refers to Christ as ‘the wisdom of God’. In Matthew 23:34 Jesus said, “I send you prophets,” so here Jesus may be referring to Himself as ‘the wisdom of God’. said: ‘I will send them prophets and apostles, and some of them they will kill and persecute,’
